tharstan widuhala mewara pasal krikat waraya aarambha karamin wennappuwa joshapwas widuhala samaga pawathi tharagayedi palamu inime jaya wartha kara ganimata samathwiya.wennappuwedi pawathi me tharagaye 2wana dinaye tharstan widuhale 16 hawiridi kawindu kulasekara me waraye palamu tharagayedima thama pasal krikat diwiye palamu shathakaya wartha karamin lakunu 151k ras kirima wishesha siduwimak wiya.palamuwenma lakunu ras kirima aarambha kala joshapwas pila siyalu dena dawi labagath lakunu 250ta pilithuru lesa tharstan pila lakunu 344 laba ganimin palamu inime jayawartha kirimata samathwiya.tharagaya nathara karana wita joshap was pila siya 2wana inima sandaha kadulu 3k dawi lakunu 39k laba sitiyaha.joshap was pila – palamu inima 250 ( siyalu dena dawi)shehan pranandu 56, kasun widana 47, primas obrs 41, yomal perera nodawi 32 (rajitha perera 77/5, - kawindu perera 26/2, rawindu lakshan 55/2 saha dewani inima 39/3 (rajitha perera 20/3)tharstan pila – palamu inima (siyalu dena dawi) 344kawindu kulasekara 151, sajiwa salgadu 67, rawindu lakshan 46, thimira jayasinha 23 (dipankara piris 68/5, hasanka rathnayaka 26/3).
